## \_HandlerOptions interface


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface _HandlerOptions<TCommandRequest = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [onFailure?](./noisecord._handleroptions.onfailure.md) |  | (req: TCommandRequest, error: Error) =&gt; Awaitable&lt;void&gt; | <p>_(Optional)_ Called if the command returned a value other than <code>undefined</code> or threw an exception.</p><p>Overrides default behavior of replying with an error and reacting with a "red cross" emoji (only for messages).</p> |
|  [onSlowCommand?](./noisecord._handleroptions.onslowcommand.md) |  | (req: TCommandRequest) =&gt; Awaitable&lt;void&gt; | <p>_(Optional)_ Called if the command did not complete before a specified delay (default is 1000ms).</p><p>Overrides default behavior of reacting with a "spinning circle" emoji (only for messages).</p> |
|  [onSuccess?](./noisecord._handleroptions.onsuccess.md) |  | (req: TCommandRequest) =&gt; Awaitable&lt;void&gt; | <p>_(Optional)_ Called if the command returned <code>undefined</code>.</p><p>Overrides default behavior of replying with "OK" (for interaction commands) or reacting with a "white tick mark" emoji (for message commands).</p> |
|  [slowCommandDelayMs?](./noisecord._handleroptions.slowcommanddelayms.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ |
